one of the true bright stars of his generation
has a very distinctive sharp tone with a rounded nasaly-inflection
has shown the ability to develop solos with both an incisive logic and an organic level of invention.
as thoughtful yet fiery a player on the bigger horn as he is on alto
a document of one of the modern mainstream's most provocative saxophonists, composers, and bandleaders,
Like a Flower Seeking the Sun
